name: Chinostes (Evil Aspect)
content:
Chinostes (Evil Aspect)

The Fallen Blade

Source Pathfinder #144: Midwives to Death pg. 74
Pathfinder Wiki Chinostes (Evil Aspect)

Details

Alignment NE
Pantheon Iblydan Hero-Gods
Areas of Concern Tragedy, sacrifice
Domains Evil, Luck, Nobility
Subdomains Curse, Martyr
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon wooden stake

On Golarion

Centers of Worship Reanpharos
Nationality Iblydan

Unique Spell Rules

Source Pathfinder #144: Midwives to Death pg. 74

Cleric/Warpriest

Undead Anatomy II can be prepared as a 5th-level spell

Oracle

Undead Anatomy II can be prepared as a 5th-level spell

Other Rules

Source Pathfinder #144: Midwives to Death pg. 74
Chinostes can grant up to 6th-level spells
